2020240.name: We Who Are About To Die Demo
2020240.description:
Fight your way through spectacles and arenas from lowly slave to Grand Champion. Or... die trying. In this unforgiving Roguelite you will face your enemies in gladiatorial combat, using a unique physics based combat system. To those who are about to die, I salute you!

The demo for We Who Are About To Die allows you to play the full game with nearly all features, up to character level 6!
